talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Geraint$
If you have more questions, I will answer you.
I don't lie but it's your choice whether you believe my words or not.

$Bishop Ignacio$
You seem very busy. The Prophet is safe, right?
Please take care of Geraint as well.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I heard you have confirmed Heraldry Scholar Stas's request.
Since I also want to ask you something, please get back to me later.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
I couldn't be on Geraint's side after the battle 50 years ago. When he disappeared without saying anything, I was very angry, shocked, and collapsed. I couldn't look at reality correctly.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It looks like you have been worried about this for a long time.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
As a Scholar, I should have said what I saw. Because if people are confused about something, they tend to conceal and fOgret about what happened. Therefore, when the Six Heroes are known for just the Six Heroes, nothing more, I should have said what I saw.
...I should have said what I saw.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I heard you confirmed Heraldry Scholar Stas's request.
I also want to ask you something, so please get back to me later.

$Geraint$
If you have more questions, I will answer you.
I don't lie but it's your choice whether you believe my words or not.

$Bishop Ignacio$
You seem very busy. The Prophet is safe, right?
Please take care of Geraint as well.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
After hearing that he is in good health, I can now finally relief. Hehe.
Since I can finally relief... could you do me a small favor once again?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I am not the only one who didn't escape from the shadow from the happening 50 years ago.
So to make it fair, shouldn't we give her a chance?
I want you to meet Master Archer Ithilien. Please.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas${action:Talk}
Master Archer Ithilien participated in the battle 50 years ago along with Lady Nerwin.
She should have some questions about the happening in the battle that she couldn't figure out, so I want you to listen to her story. Please.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I heard your story through Stashy.
I heard The One is here in Saint Haven Royal Castle. And I also heard... you {user_nick} can only meet him, the one.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
50 years ago, I accompanied Queen Narcilia to the Black Dragon Raid....
Well, she was still called Nerwin at the time.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
We believed that the troops were formed with humans and elves. But the troops became chaotic after the Dragon's appearance.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The Gold Dragon. Everyone was very shock when our leader, Geraint became a dragon. After the battle, Karacule and Barnak criticized that Geraint betrayed his friends.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Many people died and injured.
But Geraint disappeared without saying a word.
He disappeared with Argenta without any apology or explanation.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Lady Nerwin got injured because she got contaminated by the Black Dragon's blood. And Anwarendel was quickly transferred.
Lady Nerwin wanted to know about identity of Geraint and Argenta until her death.
About what Geraint and Argenta were trying to do...

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Please help me. Please help me to clear me and Nerwin's questions.
Ask Geraint and Argenta that what did they do while they're gone.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Deliver my words to Geraint.
Ask him what did he do over the past 50 years.

$Geraint$
Are you here to ask me a question again?
If you want to know, I will tell you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It seems like you still haven't escaped from the shadow as well...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Another person from 50 years ago...
So many years have pass, I believe people still havent escape from the shadow.

$Geraint$
.......
Sigh.. I haven escape from the shadow too

$Geraint$
After the battle 50 years ago, Velskud disappeared with the Black Dragon's lustre. I was wandering around Alteira to chase Velskud. And also I had to find fragments of ChaosDragon and seal them.

$Geraint$
After Goddess's Dream contaminated by poison of corruption, the world became more unstable. The containments spread all over the world and the monsters were become stronger. I told you this before, Argenta had to use her majority powers to support Monolith because Monolith became weaker and weaker.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I didn't know. I didn't know such a thing call a medium was existed in this world...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Monolith is a medium that connects Goddess and this world.
We had to support Monolith becuase we don't want this world to be broken.

$Geraint$
Argenta was kept supporting Monolith even after she was exhausted by using too much of her power. But when she saw the Second Star of Ancients, which was a call for the awakening of the prophet, she went to Calderock Village to find the descendant of the Ancients.

$Geraint$
You must know the story after.
Did I clear your question?
It's your choice whether you believe my words or not...

$Geraint$
The world is becoming more unstable. But I cannot help Argenta right now because I am still injured.
I am just admiring her tenacity and wisdom.

$Geraint$
Why are you looking at me like that?
Did I say something wrong?
I think you should return to a person who questioned about this.

$Master Archer Ithilien${action:talk}
Please tell me Geraint's answer. I will listen carefully.
I had questions for 50 years.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
The world's balance...
(Ithilien is thinking for a long time.)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I see. I understand.
They are here to protect the world.
I thought about before that they must suffered a lot.
But...

$Master Archer Ithilien$
But, was it too much to ask the dragon to understand our emotion? But I am not talking about friendship or love.
Me, Nerwin, and everyone probably thought the same.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
Geraint was our leader. We had trust in him and we liked him a lot. That is probably the reason why Karacule and Barnak lost their temper after seeing Geraint's identity.
They thought they are friends but he betrayed...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Should I ask him more about the happening?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Archer Ithilien$
But Geraint and Argenta were left without giving any excuse. The remaining people were shocked about their cold betrayal. Apparently, it was more than their severe injure. They thought they have been used and thrown away.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
No, don't. I don't want to ask anymore. Since I heard that they have been concentrated living with their destiny, this is good enough.
Because nobody can deny its own Destiny.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I should start devoting my Destiny. I will let go whatever happened in the past with wind.
(Ithilien is smiling with kind eyes.)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I told you that the partial troops from this war got ill. The symptom occured because the Black Dragon's Blood got contaminated.
I don't have the treatment, but I will try my best to cure them.

$Master Archer Ithilien$
We had the exact symptom from troops 50 years ago. I am here who remembers the happening 50 years ago.
Isn't this sound like this is my destiny?
If you have time later, please help me to cure these troops.

$Geraint$
I didn't have enough time back then. After Velskud ran away with the Black Dragon's lustre; I, for the first time, realized that there are other people who are looking for the lustre. Apparently, Velskud infiltrated into our troops by someone's command.

$Geraint$
I don't know.
I have a feeling that who did this, but since I am not sure, it's not necessary to talk about it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well... but that is not your fault.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I do not have any explaination when even my friends said I am a betrayer
Because the truth is that those people got severely injured from the battle and I didn't have ability to heal them in that time.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I don't know what to say to that.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
Since I couldn't save them, I feel more comfortable becoming an object of hatred from them.
I remember the guy said that Hatred could also have to power to keep humans alive...

$Geraint$
...I feel like I told you too much about it.
You should go outside the bright world and look for other things. Don't waste your time with things that happened in the past.

$Geraint$
...I feel like I told you too much about it.
You should go outside the bright world and look for other things. Don't waste your time with things that happened in the past.

$Master Archer Ithilien${action:talk}
Did you say you went to see Geraint again?
Wow.. You are one handsome man

$Master Archer Ithilien$
I knew he would answer it.
But at least I don't hate him. I think others will think the same.
(lthilien is kindly smiling.)

$Master Archer Ithilien$
...Geraint is still the guy who cannot be hated.
Perhaps, we probably feel much better if he really betrayed us....

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Welcome.
I became anxious after thinking about our nation, but the anxious ran away as soon as I saw you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Bishop's eyes contain patriotic sentiments and he is looking at you.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
For now, we have overcome a crisis, but I don't know such a old man like me can do any further work for Saint Haven... These days, I cannot go to sleep because I am worrying too much about this and that.

$Bishop Ignacio$
So... I was looking at Dark Overlord Keep with the Sage's Eyes, and it seems like there still have remaining evil energies.

$Bishop Ignacio$
We don't want a tragedy in this royal castle again anymore. So for our royal castle, we should defeat all the Black Dragon's evil energies.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But Geraint is injured and Argenta is...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
We need to destroy all of Evil Cores so that the Black Dragon cannot use its formal power if the Black Dragon gets back on live. But to do this, we cannot do it ourselves. The strength is out of our limit.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Well, we cannot rely everything to them. Since you said Geraint is injured, we will help you.
I was looking at my ancient book and it read that we can actually purify the black energy by borrowing ancient power.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Heraldry Scholar Stas's Request
journal.contents:
Listen to Heraldry Scholar Stas's remaining story.

Saint Haven → Heraldry Scholar Stas

journal.title: lthilies Story
journal.contents:
Go to Master Archer Ithilien who participated in the battle 50 years ago and listen to her story.

Saint Haven → Master Archer Ithilien
journal.todo_msg: Go to Master Archer Ithilien and listen to her story.

journal.title: Questioning something for 50 years
journal.contents:
It seems like Master Archer Ithilien has been questioning something for 50 years. Deliver her question to Geraint.

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Geraint
journal.todo_msg: Deliver Master Archer Ithilien's question to Geraint.

journal.title: To Ithilien
journal.contents:
Return to Master Archer Ithilien and deliver Geraint's answer.

Saint Haven → Master Archer Ithilien
journal.todo_msg: Deliver Geraint's answer to Master Archer Ithilien.

journal.title: The Remaining Stories
journal.contents:
It seems like Master Archer Ithilien no longer has any more questions. Go back to Geraint and listen to a different story.

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Geraint
journal.todo_msg: Return to Geraint and listen to the remaining story.

journal.title: At The Royal Castle
journal.contents:
It seems like people who saw the happening 50 years ago, did not get out completely free from the shadow. You should go to the Royal Castle and look for other things you can do.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Please go to the Royal Castle and look for other things you can do.
